EmailTemplate.name: New Service Assignment Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: New Service Assignment Created
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This is an automatically generated message from our ESD system.
Hello {!Admission__c.LastModifiedBy},
You have just set up a Service Assignment for {!Service_Assignment__c.Person_Being_Served__c} in ESD. Please also create the corresponding records in your Billing System.
Thank you.
